title: Field Chief Technology Officer
shortDescription:
- Lead customer-facing technical strategy for Verkada’s AI-powered physical security platform (video, access control, sensors).
- Design tailored solutions and security architectures; partner with sales/SEs on territory strategy.
- Present to C-level executives and speak at conferences; drive product adoption and feedback loops.
- Heavy travel role (>50%).
fitRationale:
- Executive customer engagement + platform adoption aligns with enterprise-scale leadership.
- Security and hybrid-cloud physical infrastructure fits governance and trust-at-scale positioning.
- Bridges product strategy with field feedback, matching architecture leadership strengths.

title: Chief Technology Officer
shortDescription:
- Lead and scale the engineering team post-Series B; define technical strategy and roadmap.
- Hands-on CTO balancing deep technical problem solving with board-level communication.
- Build AI + remote-sensing products for utility vegetation risk and grid resilience.
- Operate across Americas and Europe in a high-growth climate-tech context.
fitRationale:
- AI + data platform scaling with critical infrastructure reliability needs.
- Strategy/architecture leadership mirrors enterprise-scale transformation work.
- Governance and resilience themes map directly to trust-at-scale narrative.

title: Chief Technology Officer
shortDescription:
- Lead technical vision and architecture as the company scales platform and AI products.
- Own roadmap across data platform and AI portfolio, ensuring cohesion and scalability.
- Player-coach role: stay close to systems, tradeoffs, and delivery while empowering teams.
- Executive leadership partner to the CEO; influence business planning.
fitRationale:
- Strong alignment to data platform + AI governance themes.
- Public-sector/regulated context reinforces compliance and trust positioning.
- Strategic CTO scope fits enterprise architecture leadership background.

title: Chief Technology Officer
shortDescription:
- Define and execute the technology strategy for the LATAM engineering organization.
- Own tech budget/resource allocation; drive operational excellence in infrastructure and security.
- Scale distributed teams and align with US-based product and executive teams.
- Establish engineering KPIs and agile practices for growth.
fitRationale:
- Global platform and operations leadership aligns with enterprise-scale operating models.
- Logistics data/optimization domain fits data platform narrative.
- Executive transformation scope mirrors platform modernization experience.

title: Chief Architect
shortDescription:
- Set next-gen architecture vision for Deluxe products & platforms with a payments focus.
- Define integrated payments platform blueprint and ecosystem evolution.
- Lead and mentor an enterprise architecture team; partner with product/engineering leadership.
- Champion scalable, resilient, interoperable solutions across partner ecosystems.
fitRationale:
- Payments platform modernization + enterprise architecture leadership aligns with your platform governance DNA.
- Strong cross-functional influence at executive level fits your operating-model experience.
- Regulated payments context supports your trust-at-scale narrative.

title: Senior Vice President of Data & Infrastructure
shortDescription:
- Report to CTO; oversee 80–100 engineers across data infrastructure (ingestion, prediction, measurement, exchanges).
- Own build/buy/partner strategy for data + infra; drive impact across ambiguous problem spaces.
- Lead a US-based remote engineering org with strong cross-functional collaboration.
- Healthcare context implies high governance/privacy requirements.
fitRationale:
- Very aligned to enterprise data platform leadership + AI/analytics enablement at org scale.
- Strong data-as-product leadership role with room to shape governance, standards, and execution rigor.
- Regulated domain (healthcare) matches your governance/compliance focus.

title: Sr. Director, Data Platform Engineering & Operations
shortDescription:
- Lead SIE’s data + AI platform ecosystem (streaming/ingestion/warehouse, governance/observability).
- Operate at massive scale (millions of users; billions of data points/day).
- Stack mentions: Kafka, Databricks, Snowflake; governance tools (Alation/Collibra).
- Bay Area role (San Mateo).
fitRationale:
- Enterprise-scale data/platform leadership with explicit governance + observability responsibilities.
- Strong bridge to AI platform strategy (Databricks/Snowflake + AI/ML adoption).
- Big-org cross-functional leadership very close to your current operating environment.

title: Sr. Director, Engineering (Shared Services)
shortDescription:
- Oversee Quality Engineering, Data Engineering, and the PMO; report to the SVP of Engineering.
- Modernize testing/automation and data pipelines/warehousing with governance frameworks.
- Drive internal AI transformation for quality operations and workflow efficiency.
- Build and mentor shared-services leadership and cross-functional alignment.
fitRationale:
- Direct data platform + governance scope with AI enablement.
- Operational rigor and scale fit platform modernization narrative.
- Public company with large-scale storage aligns to enterprise experience.

title: Director, Engineering - Databricks Mosaic AI
shortDescription:
- Lead teams building Mosaic AI products at the NYC AI Engineering Hub.
- Partner with product and research to launch and scale ML/GenAI capabilities for enterprise customers.
- Define the future of AI and data applications on the Databricks platform.
fitRationale:
- High-signal AI platform leadership role with enterprise adoption impact.
- Strong fit for your narrative on governed, scalable AI delivery across data platforms.
- Cross-functional product + research alignment mirrors your context-graph and platform strategy work.

title: Director of Engineering - Data Platform
shortDescription:
- Own multi-year strategy and roadmap for an AI-ready data platform with governance, lineage, and quality.
- Establish platform standards (SLAs, observability, access controls, data quality monitoring).
- Define certified data products and enable self-serve analytics and ML/AI workflows.
- Lead and scale a data platform org reporting to Head of Data.
fitRationale:
- Direct alignment with your AI governance + trusted data product narratives.
- Emphasis on lineage, certified data products, and access control mirrors your context-graph/trust at scale themes.
- Healthcare domain strengthens the compliance and auditability story.
